name: Climbsino
description:
An unusual and difficult platformer that may induce a healthy amount of rage and frustration.

Controls: 

  • A-D to roll
  • Mouse click to jump
  • P to pause

Mechanics:

  • Dice faces indicate the force of the jump
  • Poker cards on the bottom indicate how many jumps left until an explosion
  • The poker set collectible resets your jump count

This is an entry for the GMTK 2022 game jam. It is made within 48 hours with the theme "roll the dice". We hope this frustrating little game captured that concept both literally and figuratively!

Credits:

Napp -- Programming

nubert -- Music

CELTRIK -- Art
